snippet.title: 2K Drive Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
2K Drive is now available on the App Store for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch! So get in the game and immerse yourself in all things auto-culture, with  a variety of features ranging from simulation races and fun challenges, to unique customization options, social integration, a live news-feed, and more! 

NOW AVAILABLE 
2K Drive is on Facebook and Twitter!
https://www.facebook.com/2KDrive
https://twitter.com/2kdrive
